title: Forecast of lanthanum oxide price globally 2009 to 2025
yAxis: Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton
summary: In general Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton has rose over the Year.
Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton is gradually increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly decreasing from 2011 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2024.
The line drastically increased by 5.2 times from Year 2009 to 2010,increased by 4.1 times from Year 2010 to 2011, and lastly, decreased by 3.9 times from Year 2011 to 2012.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton, about 98757.0 was reported at Year 2011
Minimum Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton about 4604.0 was reached at Year 2009
